fact.text: Napoleon Was Once Attacked By a Horde of Bunnies.
Thomas Edison Didnt Invent the Light Bulb.
All British tanks since 1945 have included equipment to make tea.
California has more people than all of Canada.
Australia is wider than the moon.
Vatican City is the smallest country in the world.
The average human body carries ten times more bacterial cells than human cells.
Water can boil and freeze at the same time.
20% of Earthâ€™s oxygen is produced by the Amazon rainforest.
